prior experience working for federal, state, or local government

strong knowledge or connection with Riverside County and California’s 36th Congressional District
availability for evening and weekend assignments

serving as spokesperson

ability to respond to challenging situations quickly and strategically
track-record of successfully pitching both national and local media entities
existing relationships with DC reporters and producers

handling multiple projects simultaneously in a demanding office environment
interfacing effectively with committee staff

key_responsibilities: coordinating and maintaining the Member’s schedule
conducting Capitol tours

representing the Member in meetings
drafting constituent correspondence

coordinating all media efforts and communications-related events

developing and implementing policy initiatives in line with office goals
meeting with constituents and other interest groups
coordinating with DC and district staff regarding legislation, messaging, and events
